input.sentences: the trails at the park are always fun to walk .
sister liked splashing her feet in the water .
many of us enjoyed a walk near the water .
we had fun looking for shells and rocks .
the opportunities for a good view were endless .
output.sentences: We took the kids to the park so they could walk on the trails.
Sister was splashing in the water.
Everyone enjoyed the walk along the water.
Brother had fun finding rocks and shells in the mud.
The opportunities were endless just like the view.
